--- title: blobster keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "API details." ---

class AzureBlobStorage[source]

AzureBlobStorage(credential_file)

AzureBlobStorage.load_credentials[source]

AzureBlobStorage.load_credentials(credential_file)

Loading credentials¶

Edit the blob_storage_credentials.json and enter your blob storage account and key information.

azure_blob_storage = AzureBlobStorage(credential_file='blob_storage_credentials.json')

AzureBlobStorage.connect[source]

AzureBlobStorage.connect()

Connect to Azure Blob Storage

Connnect to Azure Blob Storage¶

Once the credentials have been loaded with load_credentials a connection can be established by calling the connectmethod.

azure_blob_storage.connect()

AzureBlobStorage.list_all_containers[source]

AzureBlobStorage.list_all_containers()

Return all container names from blob storage

Returns¶

container_names: list all container names in blob storage

azure_blob_storage.list_all_containers()

AzureBlobStorage.delete_container[source]

AzureBlobStorage.delete_container(container_name)

Delete specific container.

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container that shall be deleted

Returns¶

None: NoneType

AzureBlobStorage.make_container[source]

AzureBlobStorage.make_container(container_name)

Make specific container. First check if container already exists

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container that shall be created

Returns¶

None: NoneType

AzureBlobStorage.list_all_blobs[source]

AzureBlobStorage.list_all_blobs(container_name)

AzureBlobStorage.delete_blobs[source]

AzureBlobStorage.delete_blobs(container_name)

Delete all blobs in specified container.

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container in which all blobs shall be deleted

Returns¶

None: NoneType

AzureBlobStorage.delete_blob[source]

AzureBlobStorage.delete_blob(container_name, blob_name)

Delete all blobs in specified container.

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container of the blob blob_name: str The name of the blob that shall be deleted

Returns¶

None: NoneType

AzureBlobStorage.file_to_blob[source]

AzureBlobStorage.file_to_blob(container_name, blob_name, file_name)

AzureBlobStorage.folder_to_container[source]

AzureBlobStorage.folder_to_container(folder_path, container_name=None)

AzureBlobStorage.df_to_blob[source]

AzureBlobStorage.df_to_blob(container_name, blob_name, df)

Write dataframe to blob

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container

blob_name: str The name of the blob that shall be created

df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame The dataframe that shall be saved as blob

AzureBlobStorage.blob_to_df[source]

AzureBlobStorage.blob_to_df(container_name, blob_name)

Load blob and return dataframe

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container

blob_name: str The name of the blob

Returns¶

df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame The Dataframe containing data of the blob

AzureBlobStorage.blobs_to_df[source]

AzureBlobStorage.blobs_to_df(container_name)

Load blobs and write to dataframe

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container

Returns¶

df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame The Dataframe containing data of the blobs

AzureBlobStorage.copy_blobs_to_other_container[source]

AzureBlobStorage.copy_blobs_to_other_container(source_container_name, destination_container_name, delete_after_copy=False)

Copy all blobs in one container to another container

Parameters¶

source_container_name: str The name of the source container

destination_container_name: str The name of the target container

delete_after_copy: bool If True, delete all blobs in source container after copy

AzureBlobStorage.download_blobs_from_container[source]

AzureBlobStorage.download_blobs_from_container(container_name, destination_path)

Download all blobs from container

Parameters¶

container_name: str The name of the container destination_path: str The destination path
